analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa ni //

analyzed: 'dir gnyis su med par smra bas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa bye brag med par lhan cig dmigs par nges pa'i gtan tshigs kyis /
translated: Here, the non-dualist, through the logical reason of the ascertainment of simultaneous observation without distinction between object and subject,

original: zla ba gnyis pa la sogs pa'i dpe las nye bar 'brel pa can myongs su gzung bas rtogs par byed do ;
analyzed: zla ba gnyis pa la sogs pa'i dpe las nye bar 'brel pa can myongs su gzung bas rtogs par byed do ;
translated: Causes the example of the two moons, etc. to be understood through the experience of the apprehended.

original: / de ltar yang /🔽dus gcig nges par rig pa ni //
analyzed: / de ltar yang / dus gcig nges par rig pa ni //
translated: Thus it is said:🔽The ascertainment of simultaneous observation

original: nges par shes dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: nges par shes dang lhan cig tu //
translated: Is ascertained together with the cognition.

original: yul min de las gzhan du na //
analyzed: yul min de las gzhan du na //
translated: Without an object, apart from that,

original: rnam pa gang gis grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis grub par 'gyur //
translated: By what aspect could it be established?

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gzhan dag gis smras pa //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis smras pa //
translated: Others say:

original: lhan cig dmigs par nges par ma grub ste /
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs par nges par ma grub ste /
translated: It is not established that they are definitely simultaneously observed.

original: 'di ltar thog mar ni yul dmigs la /
analyzed: 'di ltar thog mar ni yul dmigs la /
translated: First, the object is observed.

original: phyi nang shes pa ni shes pa gzhan gyis rang gi ngo bo yul du byed par nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi nang shes pa ni shes pa gzhan gyis rang gi ngo bo yul du byed par nus pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the outer and inner consciousnesses are able to make their own nature the object of another consciousness,

original: mngon sum gyi bdag nyid du shes pa dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi bdag nyid du shes pa dmigs pa yin te /
translated: consciousness is the observed object in the nature of direct perception.

original: shes pa mngon sum du so sor rig par nus pa'i phyir ram don gyis go ba yin no //
analyzed: shes pa mngon sum du so sor rig par nus pa'i phyir ram don gyis go ba yin no //
translated: This is understood by the meaning of the statement, “Because consciousness is able to be individually cognized in direct perception.”

original: 'di ltar yang /🔽'gas kyang don ni ma rtogs par //
analyzed: 'di ltar yang / 'gas kyang don ni ma rtogs par //
translated: In this way,🔽no one can observe consciousness

original: shes pa dmigs pa yod min te //🔽de shes pas ni rjes dpag las //
analyzed: shes pa dmigs pa yod min te // de shes pas ni rjes dpag las //
translated: without observing the object.🔽Through knowing that, one comes to understand

original: rtogs par ru ni gyur pa yin //
analyzed: rtogs par ru ni gyur pa yin //
translated: that it is inferred.

original: zhes smras pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes smras pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'di ltar shes pa'i ngo bo spangs nas //
analyzed: 'di ltar shes pa'i ngo bo spangs nas //
translated: In this way, having abandoned the nature of consciousness,

original: dang por dkar po dang ser po la sogs pa'i don gyi rnam pa so sor snang ba dmigs kyi /
analyzed: dang por dkar po dang ser po la sogs pa'i don gyi rnam pa so sor snang ba dmigs kyi /
translated: first the aspect of the object, such as white or yellow, is individually observed.

original: yang @275b phyogs bcur bltas kyang shes pa'i rnam pa dmigs pa ni med pas lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid ma grub na /
analyzed: yang @275b phyogs bcur bltas kyang shes pa'i rnam pa dmigs pa ni med pas lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid ma grub na /
translated: But even if one looks in the ten directions, the aspect of consciousness is not observed. Since it is not established that they are definitely simultaneously observed,

original: ji ltar na ma grub pa grub pa dang lhan pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar na ma grub pa grub pa dang lhan pa yin /
translated: How could that which is not established be established together?

original: des ni lam phye mar byas so //
analyzed: des ni lam phye mar byas so //
translated: It is like grinding a path into dust.

original: 'on te bde ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo nang gi 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on te bde ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo nang gi 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: But if pleasure, etc. are internal modifications,

original: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: then the nature of consciousness itself is the object.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is not reasonable,

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no apprehension of the nature of pleasure, etc.

original: 'dzin par byed pa gnyid med pas sngon po la sogs pa'i gzung ba yod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa gnyid med pas sngon po la sogs pa'i gzung ba yod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If there is no apprehension, then the object such as blue does not exist.

original: 'on te yang 'dzin par byed pa yin na de lta na yang lhan cig dmigs par nges pa med de /
analyzed: 'on te yang 'dzin par byed pa yin na de lta na yang lhan cig dmigs par nges pa med de /
translated: But if there is apprehension, then even so, there is no certainty of simultaneous observation,

original: bde ba med kyang sdug bsngal dang lhan cig dmigs la /
analyzed: bde ba med kyang sdug bsngal dang lhan cig dmigs la /
translated: because there is simultaneous observation of pain without pleasure,

original: sdug bsngal med kyang bde ba dang yin no //
analyzed: sdug bsngal med kyang bde ba dang yin no //
translated: and of pleasure without pain.

original: 'on te bde ba la sogs pa dang lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bde ba la sogs pa dang lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if there is certainty of simultaneous observation with pleasure, etc.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: bsdus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsdus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no inclusion.

original: rim gyis 'byung ba'i rang bzhin la bsdus pa mi srid de /
analyzed: rim gyis 'byung ba'i rang bzhin la bsdus pa mi srid de /
translated: It is impossible to include the gradual type within that.

original: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid re zhig med pas bye brag med par ma grub po //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid re zhig med pas bye brag med par ma grub po //
translated: Since the certainty of simultaneous observation does not exist, nondifference is not established.

original: sngon po dang ser po lhan cig dmigs par nges pa'ang tha dad par mthong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po lhan cig dmigs par nges pa'ang tha dad par mthong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because blue and yellow are seen as different, even though they are ascertained as simultaneously observed.

original: 'on te de dag la ni nges par med pas tha dad kyi 'dir yang ma nges pa nyid do zer na /🔽de ltar yin na nges pa'i rgyu mtshan smros shig / gang la nges pa yod pa de nyid la lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yod pas /
analyzed: 'on te de dag la ni nges par med pas tha dad kyi 'dir yang ma nges pa nyid do zer na / de ltar yin na nges pa'i rgyu mtshan smros shig / gang la nges pa yod pa de nyid la lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yod pas /
translated: But if you say that since there is no certainty in those two, there is difference, but here there is no certainty,🔽then if that were so, state the reason for certainty.

original: de nyid la 'bras bu las rgyu rjes su dpag go //
analyzed: de nyid la 'bras bu las rgyu rjes su dpag go //
translated: Since the reason for the certainty that something exists simultaneously with that very thing exists, the effect is inferred from the cause in that very case.

original: 'on te nges pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir bye brag med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te nges pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir bye brag med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that there is no reason for certainty, so there is no difference,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de med pa'i ngo bo yin par ma grub pa'i phyir de la the tshom za ba nyid do //
analyzed: de med pa'i ngo bo yin par ma grub pa'i phyir de la the tshom za ba nyid do //
translated: Since the nature of that nonexistence is not established, there is doubt about that.

original: gzhan yang nges pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pas bye brag yod la lhan cig dmigs par nges gzugs dang snang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang nges pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pas bye brag yod la lhan cig dmigs par nges gzugs dang snang ba bzhin no //
translated: Moreover, there is a reason for certainty, so there is a difference, because they are ascertained to be simultaneously perceived, like form and appearance.

original: ji nges pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir lhan cig dmigs par nges par bye brag med de zla ba gnyis pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji nges pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir lhan cig dmigs par nges par bye brag med de zla ba gnyis pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: But there is no reason for certainty, so there is no difference in the ascertainment of simultaneous perception, like a second moon, etc.

original: nges pa'i rgyu mtshan yod de /
analyzed: nges pa'i rgyu mtshan yod de /
translated: There is a reason for certainty.

original: tshogs pa gcig pa'i dbang nyid yin no //
analyzed: tshogs pa gcig pa'i dbang nyid yin no //
translated: It is the power of the same collection.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: tshogs pa snga ma nyid kyis ni //
analyzed: tshogs pa snga ma nyid kyis ni //
translated: By the previous collection itself,

original: shes dang yul gyi skad cig ma //
analyzed: shes dang yul gyi skad cig ma //
translated: The moment of consciousness and object

original: snang bcas gzugs ni skyed byed bzhin //
analyzed: snang bcas gzugs ni skyed byed bzhin //
translated: Are produced with appearance, like form.

original: gang gi lhan cig myong ba yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //🔽'on kyang lhan cig @276a * //
analyzed: gang gi lhan cig myong ba yin // zhes gsungs so // 'on kyang lhan cig @276a * //
translated: What is the experience of being together?

original: rig pa yang tha dad par nges par rtogs pas tha mi dad par mi rigs so //
analyzed: rig pa yang tha dad par nges par rtogs pas tha mi dad par mi rigs so //
translated: But even though there is simultaneous cognition, it is ascertained as different, so it is not reasonable that they are not different.

original: gang gi rgyus grub ces sngar smras pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gang gi rgyus grub ces sngar smras pa ma yin nam /
translated: Didn't you say earlier, By what cause is it established?

original: smras pa / bden mod kyi smras pa tsam nyid kyis grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / bden mod kyi smras pa tsam nyid kyis grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: I said that, but it is not established by mere words.

original: 'di ltar mngon sum gyis tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pas de dang lhan cig rig ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon sum gyis tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pas de dang lhan cig rig ste /
translated: Thus, since they are understood to be different by direct perception, they are cognized together.

original: tha dad pa med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir tha dad pa nyid du sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: tha dad pa med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir tha dad pa nyid du sgrub par byed do //
translated: If they were not different, they would not occur, so difference is established.

original: gtan tshigs de ni 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de ni 'gal ba yin no //
translated: That reason is contradictory.

original: 'on te zla ba gnyis su snang ba bye brag med kyang lhan cig dmigs pa srid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te zla ba gnyis su snang ba bye brag med kyang lhan cig dmigs pa srid do zhe na /
translated: But if the appearance of two moons is not different, it is possible to observe them together.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de dang lhan cig dmigs pa 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig dmigs pa 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because observing them together is mistaken.

original: 'khrul pa yang zla ba gcig tu snang ba dus gzhan la sogs pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa yang zla ba gcig tu snang ba dus gzhan la sogs pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the mistake is undermined by the appearance of one moon at another time, and so on.

original: de lta bas na 'khrul pa med par lhan cig dmigs pas tha dad pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'khrul pa med par lhan cig dmigs pas tha dad pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, without mistake, they are observed together, and so they are different.

original: yang de lta bas na gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: yang de lta bas na gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin no //
translated: And so, the reason is contradictory.

original: de la dus gzhan la sogs par lhan cig tu snang ba med pas /
analyzed: de la dus gzhan la sogs par lhan cig tu snang ba med pas /
translated: In that case, since they do not appear together at another time, and so on,

original: gang gi phyir de bas na 'khrul pa yin par grub po //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de bas na 'khrul pa yin par grub po //
translated: it is established that it is a mistake.

original: de ltar yang gnod pa can med na 'khrul par mi 'grub po zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar yang gnod pa can med na 'khrul par mi 'grub po zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it is said that if there is no harm, then error is not established.

original: gzhan yang lhan cig dmigs par nges pa zhes bya ba 'di rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang lhan cig dmigs par nges pa zhes bya ba 'di rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: Moreover, this so-called ascertainment of simultaneous observation is a logical argument from nature.

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyang mngon sum gyis grub pas tha snyad tsam sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyang mngon sum gyis grub pas tha snyad tsam sgrub par byed do //
translated: And a logical argument from nature is established by direct perception, so it proves mere convention.

original: 'dir mngon sum gyis bye brag tu grub pa med de des na 'di ji ltar na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: 'dir mngon sum gyis bye brag tu grub pa med de des na 'di ji ltar na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: Here, there is no establishment of a particular by direct perception, so how could this be a logical argument from nature?

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi 'brel pa ma grub na gzhan gang las rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs su 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi 'brel pa ma grub na gzhan gang las rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs su 'gyur /
translated: If the relation of the nature of that is not established, then from what other is it a logical argument from nature?

original: gzhan yang bye brag med ces bya ba'i don gang zhig yin par 'dod /
analyzed: gzhan yang bye brag med ces bya ba'i don gang zhig yin par 'dod /
translated: Moreover, what is the meaning of the so-called absence of distinction that you assert?

original: ci bye brag med pa tsam yin na /
analyzed: ci bye brag med pa tsam yin na /
translated: If it is merely the absence of distinction,

original: 'on te bye brag las bzlog pa nyid gcig yin /
analyzed: 'on te bye brag las bzlog pa nyid gcig yin /
translated: then is it the opposite of distinction?

original: gal te re zhig med pa sgrub na /
analyzed: gal te re zhig med pa sgrub na /
translated: If it is the establishment of the absence of something,

original: de'i med pa dang lhan cig dmigs par nges pa lhan cig 'bral ba ci zhig yod /
analyzed: de'i med pa dang lhan cig dmigs par nges pa lhan cig 'bral ba ci zhig yod /
translated: then what is the simultaneous observation of that absence and the ascertainment of simultaneity?

original: 'di ltar bye brag tu snang bas des na lhan cig dmigs par 'dzin pa med do //
analyzed: 'di ltar bye brag tu snang bas des na lhan cig dmigs par 'dzin pa med do //
translated: Thus, because of the appearance of difference, there is no apprehension of their simultaneous observation.

original: de'i snang ba med pa'i phyir ci ltar de'i gtan tshigs sgrub par byed /
analyzed: de'i snang ba med pa'i phyir ci ltar de'i gtan tshigs sgrub par byed /
translated: Since there is no appearance of that, how can it be a proof of that?

original: sngon po dang shes pa gnyis so sor snang ba med na lhan cig dmigs par nges pa med do //
analyzed: sngon po dang shes pa gnyis so sor snang ba med na lhan cig dmigs par nges pa med do //
translated: If the appearance of blue and consciousness are not individually observed, there is no certainty of their simultaneous observation.

original: 'on te lhan cig dmigs par nges par zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs gcig gi don yin na /
analyzed: 'on te lhan cig dmigs par nges par zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs gcig gi don yin na /
translated: But if the certainty of simultaneous observation is the meaning of the single reason,

original: de'i tshe yang gcig nyid @276b la dmigs pa yin nam /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang gcig nyid @276b la dmigs pa yin nam /
translated: then in that case, is it the observation of a single thing?

original: rnam pa la yin /
analyzed: rnam pa la yin /
translated: Or is it the aspect?

original: de la rtog pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la rtog pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: There are two possibilities.

original: de la gcig la dmigs pa yin na ni de nyid ma grub po //
analyzed: de la gcig la dmigs pa yin na ni de nyid ma grub po //
translated: If it is the observation of a single thing, that itself is not established.

original: srog chags gnyis pa'i yang des dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srog chags gnyis pa'i yang des dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is observed by a second living being.

original: 'on te gnyis pa'i des dmigs pa med na rab rib can gyis sgra shad la sogs pa de bzhin du de dag gis dmigs pa med do //
analyzed: 'on te gnyis pa'i des dmigs pa med na rab rib can gyis sgra shad la sogs pa de bzhin du de dag gis dmigs pa med do //
translated: But if it is not observed by a second, then like the floaters seen by one with an eye disease, they are not observed by the other.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: de la 'dir 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir rnam pa gzhan dmigs pa ni med do //
analyzed: de la 'dir 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir rnam pa gzhan dmigs pa ni med do //
translated: Here, because of error, there is no apprehension of another aspect.

original: 'dir yang mig ma nyams pa la sogs pa'i shes rab la 'khrul pa med do zhes bsgrubs so //
analyzed: 'dir yang mig ma nyams pa la sogs pa'i shes rab la 'khrul pa med do zhes bsgrubs so //
translated: And here, the proof is that there is no error in the cognition of one with unimpaired eyes, etc.

original: de lta bas na lhan cig dmigs par nges pa gcig tu ma grub po //
analyzed: de lta bas na lhan cig dmigs par nges pa gcig tu ma grub po //
translated: Therefore, the certainty of simultaneous apprehension is not established.

original: 'on te nges par rig pas bye brag tu sgrub par byed na /
analyzed: 'on te nges par rig pas bye brag tu sgrub par byed na /
translated: But if you prove it by certainty of cognition,

original: 'di ltar gang nges par rig pa de rnam pa yin pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang nges par rig pa de rnam pa yin pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
translated: then that which is the certainty of cognition is the nature of the aspect.

original: ji ltar rang rig pa ni gzhan gyi ngo bo ma yin pa ltar /
analyzed: ji ltar rang rig pa ni gzhan gyi ngo bo ma yin pa ltar /
translated: Just as self-awareness is not the nature of another,

original: nges par rig pa'i nang du 'dus pa rang rig pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nges par rig pa'i nang du 'dus pa rang rig pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not that what is included in the certainty of cognition is called self-awareness.

original: snang bar ma 'dus pa'i bum pa la sogs pa de snang ba nyid ces bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang bar ma 'dus pa'i bum pa la sogs pa de snang ba nyid ces bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: A pot, etc. that is not included in the appearance is not called the appearance itself.

original: de lta bas na sngon po la sogs pa nges par rig pa nyid nges par rig par 'dus pa nyid ces bya bar grub ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na sngon po la sogs pa nges par rig pa nyid nges par rig par 'dus pa nyid ces bya bar grub ste /
translated: Therefore, the certainty of cognition of blue, etc. is established as being included in the certainty of cognition itself.

original: nges par rig pa tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nges par rig pa tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the ascertainment is not different,

original: de ni mi rigs te snang ba'i nang du 'dus pa nyid bzhin du nges par rtogs pa nyid du sngon po la sogs pa so sor snang ba 'dus pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te snang ba'i nang du 'dus pa nyid bzhin du nges par rtogs pa nyid du sngon po la sogs pa so sor snang ba 'dus pa ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not reasonable, because just as the appearance is included, the ascertainment is included in the individual appearances of blue and so on.

original: phyi rol gyi ngo bo nyid du mngon sum gyis grub pa'i phyir ro //🔽phyi rol gyi ngo bor rtogs pas de bas na bye brag med par mi rigs te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi ngo bo nyid du mngon sum gyis grub pa'i phyir ro // phyi rol gyi ngo bor rtogs pas de bas na bye brag med par mi rigs te /
translated: This is because they are established by direct perception as having an external nature.

original: bye brag med par mngon sum dang 'bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med par mngon sum dang 'bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that they are not different, because they are not different from direct perception.

original: 'on te spyi'i ngo bor rtogs pa yang nges par rig par 'dus pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'on te spyi'i ngo bor rtogs pa yang nges par rig par 'dus pa nyid de /
translated: If you say that the ascertainment is included in the general nature,

original: rmi lam du nges par rtogs pa'i sngon po la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: rmi lam du nges par rtogs pa'i sngon po la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: like the ascertainment of blue and so on in a dream,

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: that is not reasonable.

original: nges par rig pa'i sngon po la sogs pa de dag kyang tha dad pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: nges par rig pa'i sngon po la sogs pa de dag kyang tha dad pa nyid yin te /
translated: Because those blue and so on that are ascertained are different.

original: thams cad du phyi rol dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du phyi rol dmigs pa yin te /
translated: They are all observed externally.

original: yul dang dus la sogs pa gzhan gyi bdag nyid yin par bstan to //
analyzed: yul dang dus la sogs pa gzhan gyi bdag nyid yin par bstan to //
translated: It is taught that the object, time, etc. are of the nature of another.

original: 'on te yul la sogs pa gzhan du ji ltar snang zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te yul la sogs pa gzhan du ji ltar snang zhe na /
translated: But how do the object, etc. appear as another?

original: yul thag ring po na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shing gi rtse mo na snang ba bzhin @277a * //
analyzed: yul thag ring po na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shing gi rtse mo na snang ba bzhin @277a * //
translated: Like the orb of the moon situated in the sky appearing at the top of a tree to one whose eyes are defective.

original: no ; / de lta bas na lhan cig dmigs par nges pa yang ma yin la nges par rig pa yang ma yin pas bye brag med par mi sgrub ste /
analyzed: no ; / de lta bas na lhan cig dmigs par nges pa yang ma yin la nges par rig pa yang ma yin pas bye brag med par mi sgrub ste /
translated: Therefore, since the ascertainment of simultaneous occurrence is not ascertained, and since there is no ascertainment of the object, the non-difference is not established,

original: mngon sum gyi sa bye brag nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi sa bye brag nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the difference is established by direct perception.

original: de bas na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i gzhung legs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i gzhung legs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the Yogācāra text is not good.

original: de ltar na rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ji ltar khas len zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ji ltar khas len zhe na /
translated: In that case, how is the cognition with an image accepted?

original: spyi dngos po sngon po la sogs pa nges par rig pa'i shes pa rnam pa nyid du mi rigs so //
analyzed: spyi dngos po sngon po la sogs pa nges par rig pa'i shes pa rnam pa nyid du mi rigs so //
translated: It is not reasonable that the cognition of the ascertainment of the universal, such as blue, etc., is the image itself.

original: de ltar na rnam pa med par ji ltar gzhag ce na /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa med par ji ltar gzhag ce na /
translated: In that case, how is it established as without an image?

original: gal te rnam pa nges pa yin na sngon po'i don sngon po'i rnam pa las dang / ser po ser po'i rnam pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa de rtogs pa las de'i don rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa nges pa yin na sngon po'i don sngon po'i rnam pa las dang / ser po ser po'i rnam pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa de rtogs pa las de'i don rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: If the aspect is ascertained, then the object blue would be ascertained from the aspect of blue, and yellow from the aspect of yellow.

original: don so sor nges pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: don so sor nges pa nyid yin no //
translated: The object would be ascertained from the mere ascertainment of the aspect.

original: gal te yang rtogs pa'i ngo bo tsam 'di yin na /
analyzed: gal te yang rtogs pa'i ngo bo tsam 'di yin na /
translated: If this is the nature of the cognition,

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo thams cad kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i khyad par rtogs par ni mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo thams cad kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i khyad par rtogs par ni mi 'gyur te /
translated: then one would not ascertain the difference between blue and yellow, because the nature of cognition is not common to all.

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo tsam las ni gang gis 'di sngon po yin gyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes bya /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo tsam las ni gang gis 'di sngon po yin gyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes bya /
translated: From the mere nature of cognition, one cannot say, “This is blue, not yellow.”

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, some say:

original: de rnam pa dang bcas pa yin na gsal bar don mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: de rnam pa dang bcas pa yin na gsal bar don mi 'grub ste /
translated: If it has an aspect, the object is not clearly established,

original: don mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object is not seen.

original: gang mthong ba de ni shes pa'i rnam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang mthong ba de ni shes pa'i rnam pa nyid yin no //
translated: That which is seen is the aspect of consciousness.

original: spyod yul rnam pa la dmigs pas phyi'i don ni ma yin no //
analyzed: spyod yul rnam pa la dmigs pas phyi'i don ni ma yin no //
translated: The object of the objective realm is not an external object.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone says:

original: rnam pa med na shin tu don rtogs pa nyid de /
analyzed: rnam pa med na shin tu don rtogs pa nyid de /
translated: If there is no aspect, there is direct perception of the object,

original: don de'i rang gi ngo bo so sor nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don de'i rang gi ngo bo so sor nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of that object is individually experienced.

original: ji ltar so sor snang ba thun mong nyid rtogs pa yin par ni mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar so sor snang ba thun mong nyid rtogs pa yin par ni mi 'gyur te /
translated: How can there be a realization of the common appearance of each?

original: so sor nges pa nyid du so sor snang ba las ngo bo so sor nges pa grub po //
analyzed: so sor nges pa nyid du so sor snang ba las ngo bo so sor nges pa grub po //
translated: The establishment of the individual nature is from the individual appearance of each.

original: de lta na las so sor nges pas 'di thams cad legs par gnas so //
analyzed: de lta na las so sor nges pas 'di thams cad legs par gnas so //
translated: In that case, by the individual determination of the object, all this is well established.

original: don gyi rang gi ngo bor nges par rig pa la sogs pas kyang shes pa las tha mi dad par rtogs pa med de /
analyzed: don gyi rang gi ngo bor nges par rig pa la sogs pas kyang shes pa las tha mi dad par rtogs pa med de /
translated: Also, in the determination of the nature of the object, there is no realization of the object as non-different from consciousness,

original: rang gi ngo bor nges par rig pa mngon sum gyi bdag nyid kyis lhan cig dmigs par nges pa rjes su dpag pas bsgrub par bya ba la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor nges par rig pa mngon sum gyi bdag nyid kyis lhan cig dmigs par nges pa rjes su dpag pas bsgrub par bya ba la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the direct perception of the nature of the object is established by inference, which is based on the necessary concomitance of the simultaneous occurrence of the two.

original: de bas na lhan cig dmigs par nges pas bye brag med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na lhan cig dmigs par nges pas bye brag med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that they are definitely simultaneously perceived and undifferentiated.

original: 'dir lan gdab par bya ste mngon par gyis phyi'i don dkar po dang ser po la sogs pa'i ngo bo rtogs nas shes pa yang @277b dus phyis shes pa gzhan gyi shes pa'i ngo bo bzung nas mngon sum du byed do zhes 'dir re zhig gang smras pa
analyzed: 'dir lan gdab par bya ste mngon par gyis phyi'i don dkar po dang ser po la sogs pa'i ngo bo rtogs nas shes pa yang @277b dus phyis shes pa gzhan gyi shes pa'i ngo bo bzung nas mngon sum du byed do zhes 'dir re zhig gang smras pa
translated: Here, the response is this: Having cognized the nature of external objects such as white and yellow, consciousness is also later cognized by another consciousness and made directly perceptible.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: This is not reasonable.

original: nges par rig pa'i yul can dus phyis byung ba'i mngon sum ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par rig pa'i yul can dus phyis byung ba'i mngon sum ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the direct perception that arises later as the subject of definite knowledge is not perceived.

original: don gyi rnam pa las tha dad pa'i shes pa snang ba ni med do //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa las tha dad pa'i shes pa snang ba ni med do //
translated: The appearance of consciousness that is different from the aspect of the object does not exist.

original: yul mi snang ba can la mngon sum zhes mi bya'o //
analyzed: yul mi snang ba can la mngon sum zhes mi bya'o //
translated: That which does not appear as the object is not called direct perception.

original: de bas na nges par rig pa'i yul rtogs pa med pas /
analyzed: de bas na nges par rig pa'i yul rtogs pa med pas /
translated: Therefore, because the object of definite knowledge is not cognized,

original: mngon sum mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon sum mi dmigs so //
translated: direct perception is not perceived.

original: 'dis ni don gyis go ba'i lan yang btab pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni don gyis go ba'i lan yang btab pa yin te /
translated: This also answers the response based on implication.

original: don gyis go ba la don las tha dad pa'i shes pa ni mi snang ngo ;
analyzed: don gyis go ba la don las tha dad pa'i shes pa ni mi snang ngo ;
translated: In implication, the consciousness that is different from the object does not appear.

original: / yul gyi rnam pa mi snang ba can /
analyzed: / yul gyi rnam pa mi snang ba can /
translated: The object is not seen.

original: ji ltar don 'dzin par byed de don gyis go ba yin /
analyzed: ji ltar don 'dzin par byed de don gyis go ba yin /
translated: How is the meaning apprehended? It is understood through the object.

original: de lta bas na don rtogs pas nges par rig pa nyid kyang don rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na don rtogs pas nges par rig pa nyid kyang don rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment of the meaning is the ascertainment of the object.

original: gzhan du na don rtogs pa nyid med do //
analyzed: gzhan du na don rtogs pa nyid med do //
translated: Otherwise, there would be no ascertainment of the object.

original: nges par rig pa med na don gyis go ba nyid mi srid do //
analyzed: nges par rig pa med na don gyis go ba nyid mi srid do //
translated: If there is no ascertainment, understanding through the object is impossible.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: 'dres pa dag ni mthong 'gyur las //
analyzed: 'dres pa dag ni mthong 'gyur las //
translated: “When the mixture is seen,

original: mthong ba zhes ni bya bar nges //
analyzed: mthong ba zhes ni bya bar nges //
translated: it is ascertained as seeing.

original: de ltar gang phyir 'dis de yang //
analyzed: de ltar gang phyir 'dis de yang //
translated: Thus, because of this,

original: gzhan gyi mthong ba zhes byar brjod //
analyzed: gzhan gyi mthong ba zhes byar brjod //
translated: it is called the seeing of the other.”

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is.

original: de lta bas na lhan cig dmigs par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na lhan cig dmigs par grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the simultaneous observation is established.

original: lhan cig dmigs par nges su zin kyang //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs par nges su zin kyang //
translated: Even if the simultaneous observation is ascertained,

original: ngo bo tha dad par rtogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: ngo bo tha dad par rtogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: is it not understood as having a different nature?

original: ji ltar bye brag med pa yin //
analyzed: ji ltar bye brag med pa yin //
translated: How is it without distinction?

original: de ltar na yang /
analyzed: de ltar na yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: ngo bo dbyer med mthong ba yis //
analyzed: ngo bo dbyer med mthong ba yis //
translated: “By seeing the inseparable nature,

original: blo ni dbyer med pa ru gzhag / ces gsungs so //
analyzed: blo ni dbyer med pa ru gzhag / ces gsungs so //
translated: the mind is placed in the inseparable.”

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here it is said:

original: don tha dad par snang ba sngon po'i ngo bo nyams su myong ba las gzhan pa nyid ma yin no //🔽de gnyis lhan cig dmigs par nges pa ni /
analyzed: don tha dad par snang ba sngon po'i ngo bo nyams su myong ba las gzhan pa nyid ma yin no // de gnyis lhan cig dmigs par nges pa ni /
translated: The appearance of a separate object is not different from the experience of the nature of blue.

original: zla ba gnyis pa la sogs pa bzhin du 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir zhes smras pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: zla ba gnyis pa la sogs pa bzhin du 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir zhes smras pa ma yin nam /
translated: You have not said that the ascertainment of the simultaneous observation of the two is an error, like the observation of two moons?

original: gnyis kyi ngo bor dmigs pa nyid ni med de /
analyzed: gnyis kyi ngo bor dmigs pa nyid ni med de /
translated: The observation of the nature of the two does not exist.

original: 'dir ji ltar 'khrul pa dmigs pa de ltar tha dad pa yang yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ji ltar 'khrul pa dmigs pa de ltar tha dad pa yang yin te /
translated: Here, just as the observation of an error is different,

original: gnod sbyin ji ltar de ltar gtor ma yang de lta bur rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: gnod sbyin ji ltar de ltar gtor ma yang de lta bur rigs pa yin no //
translated: so too is the offering to a yakṣa.

original: de lta bas na dpe med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas bsgrub bya ma grub po //
analyzed: de lta bas na dpe med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas bsgrub bya ma grub po //
translated: Therefore, because there is no example, the probandum is not established by inference.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone says:

original: bye brag tu dmigs pa nyid ces bya ba gang la ltos nas brjod /
analyzed: bye brag tu dmigs pa nyid ces bya ba gang la ltos nas brjod /
translated: With respect to what is it said that the observation of difference is just the observation of a particular?

original: nges par rig pa la ltos pa yin no zer na /🔽sngon po la sogs pas tha dad pas nges @278a * //
analyzed: nges par rig pa la ltos pa yin no zer na / sngon po la sogs pas tha dad pas nges @278a * //
translated: If you say it is with respect to ascertainment,

original: par rig pa rtogs pa nyid sngar bsgrubs zin to //
analyzed: par rig pa rtogs pa nyid sngar bsgrubs zin to //
translated: then the ascertainment of blue, etc., is established as the observation of difference.

original: 'on te bde ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor nges par rig pa tha dad par nges par rig go zhes smras na /
analyzed: 'on te bde ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor nges par rig pa tha dad par nges par rig go zhes smras na /
translated: Or do you say that they are definitely known to be different because they are definitely known to be the nature of pleasure, etc.?

original: de la yang smra bar bya ste /
analyzed: de la yang smra bar bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: bye brag tu smra ba med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa de'i don ni 'dir /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa de'i don ni 'dir /
translated: The meaning of the statement by the Vaibhāṣikas, “No, because they are not simultaneous” and so on, is as follows.

original: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa dag phan tshun phan par byed pa dang / phan par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid med pas /
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa dag phan tshun phan par byed pa dang / phan par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid med pas /
translated: Since they are definitely simultaneously observed and they do not have the nature of being mutually beneficial or being benefited,

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yang med do //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yang med do //
translated: there is no object apprehended and no apprehender.

original: gang cung zad byed pa med pa ni 'dzin par gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gang cung zad byed pa med pa ni 'dzin par gyur ba yin no //
translated: Whatever does not function in the slightest is an apprehender.

original: lhan cig dmigs pa la ni 'dzin par byed pa cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs pa la ni 'dzin par byed pa cung zad kyang med do //
translated: But in the case of simultaneous observation, there is not the slightest function of apprehending.

original: rang gi ngo bo grub pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par 'gyur ba yang mthong ba med do //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo grub pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par 'gyur ba yang mthong ba med do //
translated: Also, since they are established as their own nature, transformation is not seen.

original: gzhan du ma thong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du ma thong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not seen to be different.

original: shes pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na /
analyzed: shes pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na /
translated: If you say that they are known to be different,

original: shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /
analyzed: shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /
translated: what is this so-called knowledge?

original: ci skyes pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci skyes pa yin nam /
translated: Is it arisen?

original: rnam par 'gyur ba yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba yin nam /
translated: Is it a transformation?

original: thob pa yin zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa gsum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob pa yin zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa gsum du 'gyur ro //
translated: Or is it an attainment?

original: re zhig skyes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig skyes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: First, it is not produced,

original: 'dzin pa don las skyes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dzin pa don las skyes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the apprehension does not arise from an object.

original: rnam par 'gyur ba yang mi srid de /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba yang mi srid de /
translated: Nor is it possible that it is a transformation,

original: sngon mthong ba las gzhan nyid du mthong ba la rnam par 'gyur ba nges par brjod do //
analyzed: sngon mthong ba las gzhan nyid du mthong ba la rnam par 'gyur ba nges par brjod do //
translated: because a transformation is said to be a difference from what was seen previously.

original: 'on te mi shes pa shes pa skyes pa nyid rnam par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: 'on te mi shes pa shes pa skyes pa nyid rnam par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Or, if the arising of the knowledge of what was not previously known is a transformation,

original: 'di ltar 'on kyang 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pa bskyed pa ni thob pa zhes bya'o //🔽de yang don las tha dad pa yin nam //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'on kyang 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pa bskyed pa ni thob pa zhes bya'o // de yang don las tha dad pa yin nam //
translated: then the production of the knowledge that apprehends is called attainment.🔽Is that different from the object?

original: don las tha dad pa ma yin /
analyzed: don las tha dad pa ma yin /
translated: Or is it not different from the object?🔽If it is different, what is the connection between the object and the transformation?

original: gal te tha dad pa yin na don gyi rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya bar 'brel ba ci zhig yod shes pa de ni don gyis bskyed do zhes zer na /
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa yin na don gyi rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya bar 'brel ba ci zhig yod shes pa de ni don gyis bskyed do zhes zer na /
translated: If it is said that the knowledge is produced by the object,

original: de ltar na shes pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: de ltar na shes pa ci zhig yod /
translated: then what is this knowledge?

original: bskyed bya dang lhan cig rten dang brten pa'i ngo bo yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bskyed bya dang lhan cig rten dang brten pa'i ngo bo yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the object is the basis and the cognition is the object based on it,

original: mi rigs te /
analyzed: mi rigs te /
translated: that is not correct.🔽Because it is not possible for the object to be established at that time,

original: 'dam du lhung ba la snyam sa'o snyam pas gnas skabs der 'grub pa ni med do //🔽rten dang brten pa'i ngo bo'i nus pas /
analyzed: 'dam du lhung ba la snyam sa'o snyam pas gnas skabs der 'grub pa ni med do // rten dang brten pa'i ngo bo'i nus pas /
translated: since it is like a thought of a mirage.

original: las kyi ngo bor nus par 'gyur ba ni med do //
analyzed: las kyi ngo bor nus par 'gyur ba ni med do //
translated: And it is not possible for the object to be the nature of the action,🔽since it is not possible for the object to be the nature of the action by the power of the nature of the basis and the object based on it.

original: 'on te bskyed phya'i shes pa de yang shes pa'i dngos pos bskyed na /
analyzed: 'on te bskyed phya'i shes pa de yang shes pa'i dngos pos bskyed na /
translated: But if you say that the cognition that is produced is produced by the nature of cognition,

original: de yang tha dad pa'i nyid yin na /
analyzed: de yang tha dad pa'i nyid yin na /
translated: then that also is a different cognition.

original: yang shes pa bskyed pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //🔽don te don las shes pa tha dad na /
analyzed: yang shes pa bskyed pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro // don te don las shes pa tha dad na /
translated: And since it would produce another cognition, there would be an infinite regress.🔽If the object is different from the object,

original: shes pa las don tha dad pas /
analyzed: shes pa las don tha dad pas /
translated: then since the object is different from the cognition,

original: don dang shes pa tha dad pa las thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dang shes pa tha dad pa las thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: it follows that the object and the cognition are different.

original: de lta bas na @278b nges par rig pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na @278b nges par rig pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, since the object is definitely the nature of cognition,

original: shes pa las tha dad pa med pas /
analyzed: shes pa las tha dad pa med pas /
translated: since it is not different from the cognition,

original: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa las mngon par 'dod pa'i don grub po //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa las mngon par 'dod pa'i don grub po //
translated: the desired object is established from the ascertainment of the simultaneity of the object and the cognition.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzung ba'i rnam pa yang yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzung ba'i rnam pa yang yin te /
translated: Just as the aspect of apprehending is, so too is the aspect of the object apprehended.

original: bde ba la sogs pa bzhin du sngon po'i rnam pa yin pas rang rig pa kho na yin pa'i phyir rnam par rig ba tsam du grub po //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa bzhin du sngon po'i rnam pa yin pas rang rig pa kho na yin pa'i phyir rnam par rig ba tsam du grub po //
translated: Since the aspect of blue is like the aspect of pleasure and so on, it is established as mere consciousness alone, because it is reflexive awareness.

original: 'di ltar bde ba la sogs pa yod pas sngon po la sogs pa rnams las tha dad par 'dzin par byed pa nyid tha dad pa ni ma yin te /🔽lhan cig dmigs par nges pa med pa nyid kyis lhan cig tu gyur pa la bya ba med pa las /
analyzed: 'di ltar bde ba la sogs pa yod pas sngon po la sogs pa rnams las tha dad par 'dzin par byed pa nyid tha dad pa ni ma yin te / lhan cig dmigs par nges pa med pa nyid kyis lhan cig tu gyur pa la bya ba med pa las /
translated: Thus, since pleasure and so on exist, the aspect of apprehending blue and so on is not different from the aspect of blue and so on.

original: de gnyis tha dad pa med par ma grub ste /
analyzed: de gnyis tha dad pa med par ma grub ste /
translated: Since it is not ascertained that they are necessarily simultaneously observed, they do not occur simultaneously, and thus they are not established as not different.

original: tha dad par rtogs pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: tha dad par rtogs pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But are they not ascertained as different?

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here the opponent says:

original: bde ba la sogs pa dang / sngon po'i rnam pa tha dad pa med par bsgrub pa 'ba' zhig tsam gyi skabs ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa dang / sngon po'i rnam pa tha dad pa med par bsgrub pa 'ba' zhig tsam gyi skabs ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that this is merely the context for establishing that the aspect of pleasure and so on is not different from the aspect of blue and so on.

original: 'on kyang bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa rang rig pa nges par rig pa dang / lhan cig sngon po'i rnam pa dang bye brag med do zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i don yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa rang rig pa nges par rig pa dang / lhan cig sngon po'i rnam pa dang bye brag med do zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i don yin no //
translated: But the meaning of valid cognition is that the self-awareness of the aspect of pleasure, etc. is definitely known, and is not differentiated from the aspect of blue.

original: de bas na de nyid kyi phyir sngon po de shes pa de zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bas na de nyid kyi phyir sngon po de shes pa de zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, for that very reason, it is said that blue is that consciousness.

original: de zhes bya ba 'di ni sngon po nyid la 'jug ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba 'di ni sngon po nyid la 'jug ste /
translated: Here, that refers to blue itself.

original: de bas na sngon po'i shes pa dang / sngon por bye brag med do //
analyzed: de bas na sngon po'i shes pa dang / sngon por bye brag med do //
translated: Therefore, the consciousness of blue is not differentiated from blue.

original: bde ba'i rnam pa'i shes pa ni sngon po'i bde ba nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba'i rnam pa'i shes pa ni sngon po'i bde ba nyid ma yin te /
translated: The consciousness of the aspect of pleasure is not the pleasure of blue,

original: bde bar shes pas nges par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bde bar shes pas nges par rig par bya'o //
translated: but is definitely known by the consciousness of pleasure.

original: de lta bas na bde ba'i 'dzin par byed pa bde bar 'dus la /
analyzed: de lta bas na bde ba'i 'dzin par byed pa bde bar 'dus la /
translated: Therefore, the apprehender of pleasure is included in pleasure,

original: de bzhin du sngon po la sogs pas 'dzin par byed pa sngon por 'dus pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: de bzhin du sngon po la sogs pas 'dzin par byed pa sngon por 'dus pa nyid kyis /
translated: and likewise, the apprehender of blue, etc. is included in blue, etc.

original: de gnyis lhan cig dmigs par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis lhan cig dmigs par nges pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the two are definitely simultaneously observed.

original: sngon por dmigs pa spangs nas dmigs par nus pa med do //
analyzed: sngon por dmigs pa spangs nas dmigs par nus pa med do //
translated: Apart from the observation of blue, it is not possible to observe.

original: dmigs par dmigs pas de'i dmigs pa las tha dad na /
analyzed: dmigs par dmigs pas de'i dmigs pa las tha dad na /
translated: If the object of the cognition is different from the cognition,

original: gzhan du dmigs par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: gzhan du dmigs par 'gyur bas /
translated: then it would be cognized as different.

original: tha dad pa med par lhan cig dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa med par lhan cig dmigs pa yin te /
translated: But they are not different, they are necessarily simultaneously cognized,

original: chu dang 'o ma bzhin no //
analyzed: chu dang 'o ma bzhin no //
translated: like water and milk.

original: de bas na gang lhan cig dmigs par nges par de tha dad par ma dmigs te /
analyzed: de bas na gang lhan cig dmigs par nges par de tha dad par ma dmigs te /
translated: Therefore, whatever is ascertained as simultaneously cognized is not cognized as different.

original: de bas na de tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are not different.

original: gzhan du na dngos po thams cad kyi tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med par gzhag pa nyams te /
analyzed: gzhan du na dngos po thams cad kyi tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med par gzhag pa nyams te /
translated: Otherwise, the presentation of all things as different or not different would fail.

original: dngos po thams cad 'dres pas rnam par dbye ba med de /🔽me @279a * //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad 'dres pas rnam par dbye ba med de / me @279a * //
translated: Because all things would be mixed, there would be no distinction.

original: dang lcags kyi gong bu bzhin no //
analyzed: dang lcags kyi gong bu bzhin no //
translated: Like fire and a mass of iron.

original: de lta yin na tha dad par snang ba nyid kyang sngon po'i ngo bo nyams su myong ba las /
analyzed: de lta yin na tha dad par snang ba nyid kyang sngon po'i ngo bo nyams su myong ba las /
translated: If that were so, then the appearance of difference itself would not be different from the experience of the nature of blue.

original: don gzhan nyid ma yin par ci ltar de skad smras /
analyzed: don gzhan nyid ma yin par ci ltar de skad smras /
translated: How could you say that it is not a different object?

original: bde ba la sogs pa nges par rig pa rnams dang sngon po la sogs pa gzung ba dang 'dzin par gzhan dag 'dod pas de'i bsam pa las lhan cig dmigs par nges pas tha dad pa med par bsgrubs pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa nges par rig pa rnams dang sngon po la sogs pa gzung ba dang 'dzin par gzhan dag 'dod pas de'i bsam pa las lhan cig dmigs par nges pas tha dad pa med par bsgrubs pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: Since others assert that pleasure, etc. and the apprehender, such as blue, etc. are different, there is no fault in establishing their non-difference by the certainty of simultaneous observation from the perspective of that assertion.

original: 'di ltar lhan cig dmigs par nges pa yin na phan tshun phan pa byed pa med pas rang rig pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar lhan cig dmigs par nges pa yin na phan tshun phan pa byed pa med pas rang rig pa yin te /
translated: Thus, if there is certainty of simultaneous observation, they are not mutually helpful, and so they are reflexive awareness.

original: tha dad pa yang tha dad pa ma yin te rang rig pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa yang tha dad pa ma yin te rang rig pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And even if they are different, they are not different, because they have the nature of reflexive awareness.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: rang rig gi ngo bor 'dus pas de gnyis tha dad par 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyang tha dad pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rang rig gi ngo bor 'dus pas de gnyis tha dad par 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyang tha dad pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: since they are included in the nature of reflexive awareness, it is impossible to apprehend them as different, and therefore the nature of all is also not different.

original: 'dis ni ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid kyis nges pa thams cad spangs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid kyis nges pa thams cad spangs so //
translated: By this, all certainty is abandoned through non-establishment, contradiction, and uncertainty.

original: bye brag tu rig pa med pas tha dad pa yin no zhes brtag par mi nus so //
analyzed: bye brag tu rig pa med pas tha dad pa yin no zhes brtag par mi nus so //
translated: It cannot be conceived that they are different because they are not different awarenesses.

original: de ltar na rang rig pa de rang rig ngo bo 'dus pas gzhan rig par gyur pa mi rigs so //
analyzed: de ltar na rang rig pa de rang rig ngo bo 'dus pas gzhan rig par gyur pa mi rigs so //
translated: Thus, that self-awareness is not reasonable as other-awareness, because the essence of self-awareness is gathered in itself.

original: de las gzhan ni cung zad med //
analyzed: de las gzhan ni cung zad med //
translated: There is nothing else at all.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bde ba nyams su myong ba'i dus su de'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba med de /
analyzed: bde ba nyams su myong ba'i dus su de'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba med de /
translated: When bliss is experienced, the suffering of that is not experienced.

original: de bzhin du sngon po la sogs pa yang yin te zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i don yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngon po la sogs pa yang yin te zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i don yin no //
translated: Likewise, it is also blue, etc. This is the meaning of valid cognition.

original: de ltar gnyis med pa yin na ci ltar rjes su dpag par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar gnyis med pa yin na ci ltar rjes su dpag par 'gyur /
translated: If it is non-dual in that way, how can it be inferred?

original: gal te tha dad pa la brten pa rjes su dpag pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa la brten pa rjes su dpag pa yin na /
translated: If inference is based on difference,

original: de'i tshe gnyis med pa dang yang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe gnyis med pa dang yang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: then it contradicts non-duality.

original: gang zhig yang tha mi dad pa la brten pa yang gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bdag nyid gcig par shin tu rig pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig yang tha mi dad pa la brten pa yang gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bdag nyid gcig par shin tu rig pa nyid yin te /
translated: Moreover, that which is based on non-difference is the characteristic of the other, the characteristic of non-apprehension, and the complete knowledge of identity.

original: de bzhin du gang mngon sum gyi tha dad pa las ldog par nyams su myong ba de dag ni tha dad pa med pa nyid yin te /🔽dper na sngon po de nyid la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo la ltos nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du gang mngon sum gyi tha dad pa las ldog par nyams su myong ba de dag ni tha dad pa med pa nyid yin te / dper na sngon po de nyid la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo la ltos nas /
translated: Likewise, whatever is experienced as the opposite of difference is non-difference.

original: tha dad pa las log par nyams su myong ba bzhin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa las log par nyams su myong ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, the very blue, etc., is experienced as the opposite of difference in dependence on its own nature.

original: de bzhin du yang dngos po thams cad rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo ltos nas tha dad pa las log pas mngon sum gyis rtogs pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dngos po thams cad rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo ltos nas tha dad pa las log pas mngon sum gyis rtogs pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: Likewise, all things are realized by direct perception as the opposite of difference in dependence on their own and other natures. This is the reason of nature.

original: tha dad pa las log @279b par rtogs pa tsam dang 'brel pa thams cad tha dad par rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: tha dad pa las log @279b par rtogs pa tsam dang 'brel pa thams cad tha dad par rtogs pa med do //
translated: There is no connection whatsoever between the mere realization of the opposite of difference and the realization of difference.

original: de lta bas na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid rjes su dpag pa grub po //
analyzed: de lta bas na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid rjes su dpag pa grub po //
translated: Therefore, the definition of the reason of nature is established by inference.

original: de bzhin du gang zhig ma dmigs pa de ni de ltar tha snyad du bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gang zhig ma dmigs pa de ni de ltar tha snyad du bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Likewise, whatever is not perceived is not conventionally designated as such.

original: dper na ka ba la sogs pa mi dmigs pas bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ka ba la sogs pa mi dmigs pas bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, like a pot, etc.

original: dngos po thams cad bye brag tu mi dmigs pa ni mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rjes su dpag pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad bye brag tu mi dmigs pa ni mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rjes su dpag pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The non-apprehension of all things individually is called the inference of the characteristic of non-apprehension.

original: 'on te 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do zhes zer na /
analyzed: 'on te 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do zhes zer na /
translated: But if you say that the characteristic of effect does not exist,

original: de lta yin na rnam par rig pa tsam la ji ltar phyi'i don grub ces bya ba'i yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na rnam par rig pa tsam la ji ltar phyi'i don grub ces bya ba'i yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be a contradiction to say that external objects are established in the Vijñaptimātra.

original: 'on kyang rnam par rig pa tsam gyi phyogs la phyi'i don 'gegs pa nyid kyi phyir de'i sgo nas rgol ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par rig pa tsam gyi phyogs la phyi'i don 'gegs pa nyid kyi phyir de'i sgo nas rgol ba ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not a dispute on that ground, because in the Vijñaptimātra position, external objects are refuted.

original: gang zhig gis gang sun phyung ba de dang de'i sgo nas rtsod pa sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gis gang sun phyung ba de dang de'i sgo nas rtsod pa sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
translated: For one does not dispute on the ground of what one refutes.

original: gzhan du na gang cung zad rtsod pa mi sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: gzhan du na gang cung zad rtsod pa mi sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro ;
translated: Otherwise, there would be nothing that one does not dispute.

original: / de mod kyi gnyis su med par smra bas kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo bkag pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: / de mod kyi gnyis su med par smra bas kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo bkag pa kho na yin te /
translated: But the nondualists also refute the nature of cause and effect.

original: de dag kyang sgo de nas rtsod do zhes bya ba de ni gang cung zad kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang sgo de nas rtsod do zhes bya ba de ni gang cung zad kyang ma yin no //
translated: But this is not the case at all.

original: gzhan yang gnyis su med par smra ba rnams bye brag 'di dag thams cad kun rdzob tu khas len te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gnyis su med par smra ba rnams bye brag 'di dag thams cad kun rdzob tu khas len te /
translated: Moreover, the nondualists accept all of these distinctions conventionally.

original: gal te de ltar yin na mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i bye brag yod pas 'dir ci zhig 'gal ba yod /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i bye brag yod pas 'dir ci zhig 'gal ba yod /
translated: If that is so, then since there is a distinction between direct perception and inference, what contradiction is there here?

original: de ltar re zhig spyir lan btab pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig spyir lan btab pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having presented the general response,

original: da ni rgol ba tha dad pa'i lan gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rgol ba tha dad pa'i lan gdab par bya ste /
translated: now the response to the specific objections will be presented.

original: lhan cig dmigs par ma grub ste /
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs par ma grub ste /
translated: The simultaneity of the two is not established.

original: 'di ltar sngar yul dmigs nas phyis nges par rig pa 'di rtogs pa'i mngon sum las don gyis go ba yin no zhes re zhig gang smras pa de'i lan gdab ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar sngar yul dmigs nas phyis nges par rig pa 'di rtogs pa'i mngon sum las don gyis go ba yin no zhes re zhig gang smras pa de'i lan gdab ste /
translated: In this way, first, the response to the statement “The cognition of the object is subsequent to the perception of the object” is as follows.

original: yul gyi rnam pa spangs nas /🔽shes pa tha dad par rtogs pa'i mngon sum mam /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa spangs nas / shes pa tha dad par rtogs pa'i mngon sum mam /
translated: The cognition of the object is not separate from the perception of the object.

original: don gyis go ba de bzhin du mthong ba ni med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: don gyis go ba de bzhin du mthong ba ni med pa kho na'o //
translated: The direct perception that cognizes the object separately or the inference that cognizes the object separately is not seen at all.

original: don dang 'brel zhing shes pa nyams su myong ba mthong na yul gyi don ji ltar rtogs te /
analyzed: don dang 'brel zhing shes pa nyams su myong ba mthong na yul gyi don ji ltar rtogs te /
translated: If it is related to the object and is experienced as cognition, how is the object understood?

original: de'i tshe sngon po'i don rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe sngon po'i don rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: At that time, the object blue is not understood.

original: nges par rig pa 'am /
analyzed: nges par rig pa 'am /
translated: If it is the ascertainment of cognition,

original: don nges par rig pa ste ji ltar shes pa rtogs pa yin /
analyzed: don nges par rig pa ste ji ltar shes pa rtogs pa yin /
translated: how is the ascertainment of the object understood?

original: 'on te blo yang de'i tshe nges par rig na shes pa rig pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te blo yang de'i tshe nges par rig na shes pa rig pa yin no //
translated: But if cognition is ascertained at that time, then cognition is cognized.
The object

original: nges par rig pa'i dus na yul las tha dad pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa nges par rig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par rig pa'i dus na yul las tha dad pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa nges par rig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not cognized at the time of the ascertainment of the object, because the aspect of cognition that is different from the object is not ascertained.

original: gang yang 'ga' zhig gis yul shes pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: gang yang 'ga' zhig gis yul shes pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Now, someone might say, “There is no cognition of the object,” and so on. That should be analyzed.

original: yul las tha mi dad pa'i blo ma rtogs te don mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba yin na 'dir grub pa bsgrub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: yul las tha mi dad pa'i blo ma rtogs te don mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba yin na 'dir grub pa bsgrub pa kho na'o //
translated: If it is said that the cognition that is not different from the object is not understood, and the object is not observed, then here it is only the establishment of what is already established.

original: 'on te tha dad pa min na de ma shes pas de yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'on te tha dad pa min na de ma shes pas de yang mi dmigs so //
translated: But if it is not different, then because it is not known, it is also not observed.

original: rjes su dpag pas shes so zhes zer na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas shes so zhes zer na /
translated: If it is said that it is known through inference,

original: yul gyi rnam pa dang bral bas rjes su dpag pas kyang nges par rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa dang bral bas rjes su dpag pas kyang nges par rig pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is devoid of the aspect of the object, it is not ascertained by inference either.

original: bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin par byed pa ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de las tha dad pa'i sngon po la ltos nas rigs pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin par byed pa ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de las tha dad pa'i sngon po la ltos nas rigs pa kho na yin no //
translated: As for the claim that it does not apprehend pleasure and so on, that is reasonable only in relation to blue and so on, which are different from it.

original: nges par rig pa dang tha mi dad na ni yang sngon po la sogs pa gang dag yin pa thams cad kyi 'dzin par byed pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: nges par rig pa dang tha mi dad na ni yang sngon po la sogs pa gang dag yin pa thams cad kyi 'dzin par byed pa nyid yin te /
translated: If it is not different from ascertainment, then it would be the apprehender of all that is blue and so on,

original: gang cung zad gzhan gyis smras pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gang cung zad gzhan gyis smras pa bzhin no //
translated: just like whatever else is said to be so.

original: gang lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid du bsgrubs pa re zhig bye brag med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid du bsgrubs pa re zhig bye brag med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: As for the proof of the necessary simultaneity of perception, that is not established without distinction,

original: sngon po dang ser po gnyis tha dad par yang lhan cig nges par dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa de mi rigs te /
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po gnyis tha dad par yang lhan cig nges par dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa de mi rigs te /
translated: because blue and yellow are also ascertained as simultaneous, even though they are different.

original: de la nges par mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la nges par mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is unreasonable, because there is no seeing of them as such.

original: bde ba la sogs pa nges pa de nges par rig pas sngon po la sogs pa de nges par rig pa yin pas lhan cig dmigs par nges pa med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa nges pa de nges par rig pas sngon po la sogs pa de nges par rig pa yin pas lhan cig dmigs par nges pa med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Since the ascertainment of pleasure, etc. is the ascertainment of that cognition, the ascertainment of blue, etc. is also the ascertainment of that cognition. Therefore, the simultaneity of their observation is not uncertain,

original: sngon po dang ser po bzhin no //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po bzhin no //
translated: like blue and yellow.

original: nges par rgyu mtshan de smros shig ces gang smras pa de la /
analyzed: nges par rgyu mtshan de smros shig ces gang smras pa de la /
translated: As for what was said, “state the reason why they are ascertained to be simultaneous,”

original: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa'i rgyu mtshan nyin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa'i rgyu mtshan nyin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: it should be understood that the reason why they are ascertained to be simultaneously observed is that they are ascertained to be simultaneously observed.

original: de ltar yang tshogs pa snga ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang tshogs pa snga ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: In that case, what was said, “the prior collection,” etc. is unreasonable.

original: tha dad par grub pa yin na tshogs pa gcig pa'i dbang gis lan gdab par rigs na /
analyzed: tha dad par grub pa yin na tshogs pa gcig pa'i dbang gis lan gdab par rigs na /
translated: If they were established as different, it would be reasonable to respond by the power of a single collection.

original: 'dir yang sngon po dang ser po nges par rig pa tha dad pa med par dmigs pa med par nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir yang sngon po dang ser po nges par rig pa tha dad pa med par dmigs pa med par nges pa nyid do //
translated: But here, the ascertainment of blue and yellow is not different, and their observation is ascertained to be simultaneous.

original: gzugs dang snang ba gnyis kyang gang zhig tha dad pa med par dmigs na gang cung zad kyang tha dad pa med par 'dod do //
analyzed: gzugs dang snang ba gnyis kyang gang zhig tha dad pa med par dmigs na gang cung zad kyang tha dad pa med par 'dod do //
translated: Also, if form and light were observed without difference, then they would not be accepted as different in the slightest.

original: lhan cig dmigs par nges pas tha dad pa med de zla ba gnyis pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de la zla ba gnyis pa dang / de nges par rig pa gnyis 'dir tha dad pa nyid du cung zad kyang mi 'dod @280b de bzlog par 'khrul pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs par nges pas tha dad pa med de zla ba gnyis pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de la zla ba gnyis pa dang / de nges par rig pa gnyis 'dir tha dad pa nyid du cung zad kyang mi 'dod @280b de bzlog par 'khrul pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the two moons and the ascertainment of them are not at all different, because it is impossible to mistake them for anything else.

original: ji ltar rig pa de bzhin du don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar rig pa de bzhin du don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And just as the ascertainment is, so is the object, because it is not nonexistent.

original: lhan cig rig pa yang bye brag tu rig na bye brag med par mi rigs so zhes gang smras pa de yang dgag par bya ste tha dad par rtogs so zhes bya ba de nyid ma grub ste /
analyzed: lhan cig rig pa yang bye brag tu rig na bye brag med par mi rigs so zhes gang smras pa de yang dgag par bya ste tha dad par rtogs so zhes bya ba de nyid ma grub ste /
translated: As for the claim that if there is simultaneous ascertainment, it is not tenable that there is no difference, that is also refuted, because there is no difference in the realization.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin ba gnyis mngon sum gyis tha dad par rtogs pa med do zhes bsgrubs zin to //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin ba gnyis mngon sum gyis tha dad par rtogs pa med do zhes bsgrubs zin to //
translated: That is not established, because it has been proven that the two, the object and subject, are not realized to be different by direct perception.

original: lhan cig nges par rig pa dang med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir tha dad par sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes gang smras pa de yid la re ba tsam mo //
analyzed: lhan cig nges par rig pa dang med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir tha dad par sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes gang smras pa de yid la re ba tsam mo //
translated: As for the claim that they are proven to be different because they are ascertained simultaneously and because they are invariably related, that is mere wishful thinking.

original: lhan cig pa'i don ni tha dad pa las bzlog par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig pa'i don ni tha dad pa las bzlog par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the meaning of “together” is asserted to be the opposite of “separate.”

original: lhan cig pa ni lhan cig kho nar dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: lhan cig pa ni lhan cig kho nar dmigs pa ste /
translated: “Together” means that they are observed only together,

original: tha dad pa med ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa med ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: up to “without being separate.”

original: 'o ma dang chu lhan cig pa'i gnas skabs bzhin no //
analyzed: 'o ma dang chu lhan cig pa'i gnas skabs bzhin no //
translated: It is like the case of milk and water together.

original: de lta bas na mngon sum gyis tha dad pa med par grub pa la rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis tha snyad tsam bsgrub po zhes bya ba de nyid ni rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na mngon sum gyis tha dad pa med par grub pa la rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis tha snyad tsam bsgrub po zhes bya ba de nyid ni rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that, in the case of establishing nondifference by perception, the autonomous inference establishes mere nondifference.

original: gang sngar lhan cig dmigs par nges pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don gang yin par 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pa bsgrubs pa /
analyzed: gang sngar lhan cig dmigs par nges pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don gang yin par 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pa bsgrubs pa /
translated: What is the meaning of the statement “because of the definite simultaneous observation”?

original: de yang rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa tsam 'ba' zhig ste /🔽tha dad pa med pa nyid lhan cig dmigs par nges pa ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa tsam 'ba' zhig ste / tha dad pa med pa nyid lhan cig dmigs par nges pa ste /
translated: That is merely a conceptual superimposition.🔽Nondifference is the definite simultaneous observation.

original: tha mi dad par bsgrubs pa la gnod pa can med do //
analyzed: tha mi dad par bsgrubs pa la gnod pa can med do //
translated: There is no refutation of the establishment of nondifference.

original: gang lhan cig dmigs par nges pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don de la yang brtag pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: gang lhan cig dmigs par nges pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don de la yang brtag pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The meaning of the reason “because they are ascertained to be simultaneously observed” is also twofold.

original: gcig dmigs par byed pa yin nam /
analyzed: gcig dmigs par byed pa yin nam /
translated: Is it that one is observed?🔽Or is it that a single ascertainment is observed?

original: nges pa gcig dmigs pa zhes bya gal te rnam pa gcig yin na des de ma grub ste /
analyzed: nges pa gcig dmigs pa zhes bya gal te rnam pa gcig yin na des de ma grub ste /
translated: If it is a single aspect, that does not prove it,

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag tha dad par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag tha dad par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is realized that the object and subject are different.

original: 'on te skyes bu gcig dmigs pa lhan cig dmigs pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te skyes bu gcig dmigs pa lhan cig dmigs pa yin na /
translated: But if it is that a single person is observed,

original: de'i tshe yang gsal ba kho nar gsung ba'i rnam pa rtsig pa la sogs pa dang / skyes bu gzhan yang rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang gsal ba kho nar gsung ba'i rnam pa rtsig pa la sogs pa dang / skyes bu gzhan yang rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa /
translated: then it is clear that the aspect of the wall and so on and another person are also realized.

original: de lta bu de dag thams cad ni nam mkha' ldang ba yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu de dag thams cad ni nam mkha' ldang ba yin te /
translated: All of these are like the sky dancer.

original: rnam pa gcig tu dmigs pa la gnod pa med pas /
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu dmigs pa la gnod pa med pas /
translated: Since there is no contradiction in observing a single aspect,

original: bye brag med par bsgrub par bya ba la gnod pa med do //
analyzed: bye brag med par bsgrub par bya ba la gnod pa med do //
translated: there is no contradiction in establishing it without distinction.

original: 'dis ni skyes bu gcig pa dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i lan yang btab ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni skyes bu gcig pa dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i lan yang btab ste /
translated: This also answers the question, “Is it that a single person is observed?”

original: skyes bu gzhan dmigs par ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis gnod pa las na /🔽skyes bu gzhan dmigs par rang rig pas ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: skyes bu gzhan dmigs par ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis gnod pa las na / skyes bu gzhan dmigs par rang rig pas ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//
translated: But it is contradicted by the direct perception of self-awareness that perceives another person.🔽Because another person is not perceived by self-awareness.

original: @281a * // rjes su dpag pa yang mngon sum mi 'jug par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @281a * // rjes su dpag pa yang mngon sum mi 'jug par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And inference does not operate without the engagement of direct perception.

original: yang spyi yul nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang spyi yul nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, because the universal is the object,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan nges par rtogs pa rjes su dpag pas ni bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan nges par rtogs pa rjes su dpag pas ni bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the realization of another's mind cannot be established by inference, which cognizes its own characteristics.
